BlockCTA.text: Hey there! We’re Agile Alpaca, your friendly neighborhood marketing agency, dedicated to creating tailor-made strategies for every client, regardless of industry or niche. Dive in to learn more about our unique touch!

BlockTestimonials.heading: What our customers say
BlockTestimonials.text: Agile Alpaca transformed our business, guiding us from local markets to international success. Their expertise in e-commerce and ongoing support have been invaluable.

testimonial1.name: Mark Dumnich
testimonial1.text: We have been manufacturing watches for many years. Still, I didn’t understand how to go into ecommerce, and learned from Oleksandr. Now we are a well established brand, and collaborate with his TeamBlock on several Shopify projects.

testimonial2.name: Igor Bilous
testimonial2.text: I collaborate with Oleksandr on my digital projects. He is a well-known figure in international e-commerce, and is always available for all matters, from creating our website to optimizing it for search engines.

testimonial3.name: Ivan Kozak
testimonial3.text: We ran an arts studio in Lviv working on local markets. Oleksandr showed me the way to sell internationally and helped me on early stages in 2016-2017. Now that we sold our ServiceContainer more than 20,000 times, I have to thank him for all the expertise and loyal attitude to me all along the way.
